## Biography

Since 2024, Dr. Jingting Huang has been a Postdoctoral Associate in the Engineering Environmental Equity (E^3^) Lab at the University of Georgia. In her free time, she enjoys photography in US national parks :deciduous_tree::camera: and has checked out 20 out of 63 national parks:heavy_check_mark:

## Favorite US NP list

Glacier NP
Yellowstone NP
Acadia NP
Zions NP
White Sands NP
Grand Teton NP

## Map of US NPs

```{r warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)

leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%     
  addMarkers(lng = -113.7183, lat = 48.7596, popup = "Glacier NP") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -110.5885, lat = 44.4280, popup = "Yellowstone NP") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -68.2733, lat = 44.3386, popup = "Acadia NP") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -113.0263, lat = 37.2982, popup = "Zion NP") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -106.1709, lat = 32.7791, popup = "White Sands NP") %>%
  addMarkers(lng = -110.8000, lat = 43.7904, popup = "Grand Teton NP")
```
